scripts.kill: lsof -ti:3002 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No processes found on port 3002'
scripts.release: gh workflow run release.yml -f package=both -f bump=patch
scripts.release:viewer: gh workflow run release.yml -f package=viewer -f bump=patch
scripts.release:core: gh workflow run release.yml -f package=core -f bump=patch
scripts.release:minor: gh workflow run release.yml -f package=both -f bump=minor
scripts.release:major: gh workflow run release.yml -f package=both -f bump=major
